description: Try our easy to follow Pasta With Flageolet Beans, Parsley & Lemon recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pasta,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Soy free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Pasta With Flageolet Beans, Parsley & Lemon Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 400g can flageolet beans, drained and rinsed
1 handful fresh flat-leaf parsley, roughly chopped
1 clove garlic, grated or finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Place the first six ingredients in a large bowl and stir well to combine. Season well with salt and black pepper. Leave to sit while you cook the pasta - the flavours will develop.

Cook the pasta in a large pan of boiling salted water for 10 minutes, or until it is cooked but still has a bit of bite to it. Drain, keeping back a tiny amount of the cooking water. Return the pasta to the pan and toss together. Add the sauce, toss to combine, and serve.
